name: Fruit Picker - The Quest to Grow
name_original: Fruit Picker - The Quest to Grow
description:
Movement

AD - Movement

LSHIFT - Sprint

W - Jump (Upgrade)

W (Mid-air) - Double Jump (Upgrade)

E = Teleport (Checkpoint)

M1 - Click TP (Upgrade)

UPGRADES

+(Fruit) - Get more height from the tree

+Growth - Tree regenerates fruit quicker

ALL SPRITES MADE BY KENNEY
